QuestData.Title: Captain's Log
QuestData.Description: <You leaf to the final, interrupted entry.>$B$B...approaching the Temple of Earth at 300 knots and commencing landing maneuvers according to new route. We've made note of a low pressure system in the north and redrawn our...$B$BBLOOD AND THUNDER! ALLIANCE SCUM APPROACH!!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Captain's Log to Maruut Stonebinder at the Temple of Earth in Deepholm.
QuestData.RewardText: Why would the Alliance attack the Horde just as they're about to deliver a fragment of the World Pillar to us?
